I would change my height to be taller. I think being taller would make me feel more confident and assertive. Plus, I think it would make me more noticeable in a crowd.
I would change my hair color to be blonde. I have always been fascinated by the way blonde hair looks and I think it would be a fun change of pace.
I would change my skin tone to be darker. I think having a darker skin tone would make me look more exotic and mysterious.
I would change my eye color to be green. I think green eyes are very striking and I think it would be a unique and interesting feature to have.
I would change my nose shape to be more pointed. I think a more pointed nose would make my face more symmetrical and I think it would make me look more confident and put together.
